p: For the sake of interpreting large-scale patterns over time, litters were binned according to farrowing date. We established a baseline for variation across bins in the average PMI based on the period from 1 January 1995 to 31 October 1996. In figure 1 b, the binned PMI values are scaled in terms of the binned PMI percentile (relative to variation within the parametrization period). Absolute values and further details of the analysis are shown in the electronic supplementary material.
